content.rendered:
Welcome!

Hôtel Belley is a 8-rooms hotel located in the magnificent sector of the Old Port of Quebec!

Our location is simply unparalleled! The cobbled streets, lined with historic buildings that echo tales of a bygone era, take our guests on a journey through time.

Situated directly above the vibrant Taverne Belley, our hotel exudes the ambiance of Quebec’s bustling nightlife. While many revel in the lively atmosphere, it’s worth noting that the sounds of the tavern can permeate into the night.

For those with a light slumber, the nocturnal symphony might be disruptive. We value the tranquility of our guests, so if you’re seeking a silent night’s rest, this setting might not be the ideal choice. We recommend considering your sleep preferences when booking to ensure the most enjoyable stay.

We look forward to welcoming you within our walls!
